verses.roman:
praveśa kariyā dekhe, saba--andhakāra
rahite nāhika sthāna, karilā vicāra

synonyms: praveśa kariyā—after entering; dekhe—He sees; saba—everywhere; andhakāra—complete darkness; rahite—to remain there; nāhika sthāna—there was no place; karilā vicāra—then He considered.
translation: "When Mahā-Viṣṇu entered each of the limitless universes, He saw that there was darkness all around and that there was no place to stay. He therefore began to consider the situation.
